website_summaries.verdict: A four-boot pack that offers extra support and is especially useful for horses coming off of injury.
pros: Much appreciated by trainers, these are lightweight neoprene boots
Extra shock absorbing lining protects the cannon bone, tendons, and soft tissue
An angled suspensory ligament strap helps protect the fetlock and makes sure the boots are positioned properly
cons: These boots are a little more stretchy than others, so they need more adjustment to make sure they are snug

customer_reviews.title: Great Professional Choice Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great Professional Choice product. Great fit and easy to put on. We figured a great way to dry them out between wearings. We took 2 hangers with clips on them that we got when we bought some shorts. Place the 2 front ones back to back and clip them on the top edge with the hanger clips. Do the same with the rears. They dry out very well this way and avoids getting all of the Velcro tabs from snarling them together.
customer_reviews.author: Reosmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Trail Riding
customer_reviews.text: My horse & I love to explore new trails. We sometimes encounter tall thick grass & these keep him protected against scratches. I don't like to keep them on for more then 2 hours especially if we're doing a lot of cantering or galloping in the hot months mainly because they do hold heat. I brought them to protect his legs. They are made well & are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple Girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what my horse needs. Support and flexibility. It’s amazing how easy they are to put on and take off. The airflow vents seem more comfortable than the none vented ones I borrowed to see if support would help him. Turns out he needed some support to return to his youthful gait. He’s only 23 and has lots left to give.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: The boots fit my horse really good. The Boots are made really well. The Velcro is strong and it holds nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: These are the best boots. I love Professional Choice and so does ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots. I love Professional Choice and so does my horse. Fast shipping as well, I live in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany and they were here within a week of being shipped. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: The best wraps out there
customer_reviews.text: This set comes as a replacement set that I had for 6+ years. The first set still had not worn out, just was starting to. These are great, easy to put on, and make me feel safe for my horse on rocky trails. I would not use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: skeptical

customer_reviews.title: Do not BUY
customer_reviews.text: These were nothing like the orig boots I had bought in the past. Used for the first time last night. Hate them. Cut wrong. Doesn’t snug up. Wish I could return. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Vickie  Bookhardt

customer_reviews.title: Professional choice is always are number one choice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter always uses professional choice for her sport & bell boots and they have served her well by protecting her horse while doing western games and barrel racing. Many compliments on this color also.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fits my horse, nice material
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended sports medicine boots for my older mare. So far, these are working out great. They stay on well, fit well, and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Allison1076

customer_reviews.title: Quality boots, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The vet reccomend I use sport boots on my OTTB gelding. He is 16hh and the large fits him perfectly! He is clumsy so they're perfect for preventing injuries when he inevitably forgets where his feet are and knocks his legs against each other. Plus, the sloth print is super cute! When they get dirty I just hose them off and let them sit out in the AZ summer heat to dry
customer_reviews.author: Em Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than the regular SMB boots. I like how stretchy the fabric is and how snug they fit. The sizing chart is accurate and they conform perfectly to my thoroughbred's legs. I wish they didn't pick up stickers while riding in dry grass, but that's just life!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hugg

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend getting a size smaller than normal
customer_reviews.text: These are much bigger/stretchier than my previous sets of boots from professionals choice. I would recommend getting a size smaller than normal. Disappointed for the amount of $ spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I opted for a number smaller, medium for 12 inch circumference, fits perfect. Chocolate looks great on my brown horse. A bit pricey but good quality; will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Sport Boots
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Professional Choice Sport Boots for over 20 years. I've had the opportunity to try other brands, and I always go back to Professional Choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. EXCELLENT customer service. I had some questions and got immediate responses. Love supporting a family business. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn F. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, beautiful color, excellent support.
customer_reviews.text: These SMB boots Breith well, offer excellent support, are easy to clean, and I love this turquoise color.
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Camras

customer_reviews.title: Awesome service
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with delivery (not their fault), I contacted them and they got the item to me within a few days! It is a Christmas gift so I was starting to panic but they were awesome and I am very impressed. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: catherine r erath

customer_reviews.title: Boot review
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received these as a gift and really like them- she hasn’t used the on her horse much yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hall

customer_reviews.title: Velcro ripped off while putting on
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality...Velcro ripped after only having them for 6 months! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on my horse, both front and back. High quality that I expect from Professionals Choice. Pretty purple. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sandler

customer_reviews.title: Best boots on the market
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ridden in professional choice boots for over 20 years and they have never disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Howe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love the benefits of these boots, and they look great. It just seems like the Velcro begins to not stick as well before very many used at all... They still work well though.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Quality sport boots
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sport but when I went to pick out the color though I was hoping for a little brighter wine color
customer_reviews.author: anna nelson

customer_reviews.title: Bummer  !
customer_reviews.text: At this point, I am very disappointed in this product. Does not hold the cold.
customer_reviews.author: T. Combs

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The problem is with the velcro it rips off where the stitching sews it to the boots. I have had to have the velcro replaced 2 times since I bought them in June/
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Great products! We have alot of these and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Chad E.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: professionals choice SMBs have all ways been my go to splint boots . They are easy to clean and last me a good while . I still use my old pare of splints and bell boots at rodeos when it’s raining , or just cause I can .
customer_reviews.author: shelby shaw

customer_reviews.title: Horse loving grammy
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, easy application, and all around great boot. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping best product for leg protection
customer_reviews.text: I love pro choice boots. Shipping was fast. Product was new as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Furze

customer_reviews.title: the best boots out there
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to boots for all my reined cow horses
customer_reviews.author: Jill P

customer_reviews.title: Not the bright red that is shown in the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the bright red that is shown in the picture , it's a darker color but they fit well and serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: sarah bombard

customer_reviews.title: Quality and protection
customer_reviews.text: My horse LOVES to be turned out... Especially overnight. He gets very rowdy in turnout. These wraps have SIGNIFICANTLY decreased cuts and bruises. I will buy this brand again once needed. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Clearly labeled, great quality, and easy to put on. Highly recommend! Color is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: Support boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. I use them just to add extra support for my horse's legs. The velcro is SUPER strong...these boots will not fall off your horse!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and wear
customer_reviews.text: I love this style the best of the PC boots.
customer_reviews.author: Hera Minkove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my big Quarter Horse, great for both training and trail riding.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. These are a quality product, easy to clean and made extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: JoKo

customer_reviews.title: and look amazing on him
customer_reviews.text: They shipped quick! Fit my 15 hand quarter horse, and look amazing on him! Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Traca91

customer_reviews.title: Great horse boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit the horse well and are good protection. Definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a good horseboot
customer_reviews.author: Jules Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Ok shipping time, I got a large and it fits my 15.1hh appendix barrel horse perfectly. Makes him look super cute! Tons more durable than the Performers 1st Choice ones I got exactly one year ago that have already ripped and are flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia

customer_reviews.title: always great.
customer_reviews.text: Get a lot of things from this company, always great.
customer_reviews.author: Kay D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are an excellent product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Nylene Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Good product  excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and price was excellent. Arrival time was a little longer than expected. Would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: shannon kuhn

customer_reviews.title: My horse looks so cool
customer_reviews.text: My horse looks so good in these. These are great boots but now have fun designs...these are awesome. And they protect your horse
customer_reviews.author: mbeez

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a great value. The large size is perfect for both my stocky quarter horse and a large Thoroughbred.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McMahon

customer_reviews.title: he is enjoy them.
customer_reviews.text: thank You for my horses boots. he is enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Outrageous delivery time. Quick to take your $ but don't deliver your order when they say!
customer_reviews.text: One star because I ordered these boots WEEKS AGO and the delivery time has come and gone! STILL NO BOOTS!!! Wish I had not ever ordered these in good faith because the company doesn't care if they send them to you or not and now I have to begin the tedious task of trying to get my money back because she didn't bother to fulfill my order!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

product_meta.title: Professionals Choice Equine Sports Medicine Ventech Elite Leg Boot Value Pack, Set of 4
product_meta.description: As an incentive to conscientious horsemen who realize the benefits of booting all four legs, we are offering a Value 4-Pack which contains a full set of both front and rear VenTECH™ Elites at a substantial savings. We receive countless affirmations from horsemen crediting our Sports Medicine Boots with saving their horses from catastrophic leg injuries. According to a study conducted at the University of Minnesota, thoroughbred race horses booted with front SMBs “exhibited increased comfort wearing the boots as they shifted their weight forward. Combining the high level of protection and energy absorption with minimal effects on the gait, the Sports Medicine Boot is a valuable tool in prevention of lower limb injuries during training and performance, as well as a valuable addition to the treatment regime for rehabilitating horses with limb injuries.” Booting all four legs allows the horse to comfortably maintain its normal distribution of weight. 30-Day money-back guarantee/one-year w­arranty or as required by law.
